page.title: 01SHOPS
page.content: This area has a large proportion of shops as well as large department stores.The town centre has a wide variety of shops to cater for everything.On the business side,there are a lot of offices.There is a wide range of bus and rail services.There is also many miles of canals. Leaving the centre you find that there are still many buildings.Not all of these are shops and offices-houses and flats of all types.There are a mixture of ages on the houses,some modern while others built around the time of 1945. There are parks,recreation and sports grounds around the area.We also have the Edgbaston reservoir which is a popular place.Entertainment is no problem as there are theatres,cinemas and discos.There is also a wide range of hotels in which to stay. I GRAVENOR
